Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Interface IServer

All Known Implementing Classes:
SocketServer
public interface IServer
A server instance that can receive and send messages to clients

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static java.lang.String UNIDENTIFIED_PLAYER_PREFIX
    Messages from non-identified players have the player set as this string followed by a unique number

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void disconnect​(java.lang.String player)
    Disconnect a player
    void identify​(java.lang.String tempName, java.lang.String player)
    Identify a temporary fake name with the actual player name
    static boolean isIdentified​(java.lang.String player)
    Checks if the player is identified
    void registerHandler​(IConnectHandler receiver)
    Register a connect handler
    void registerHandler​(IErrorHandler receiver)
    Register a error handler
    void registerHandler​(IMessageHandler receiver)
    Register a message handler
    void send​(OutboundMessage message)
    Send a message to a player The message will reach the player in an unspecified amount of time If there's an error while sending the message, the error handlers will be notified
    void shutdown()
    Shut down the server, disconnecting every player

  • Field Details

    • UNIDENTIFIED_PLAYER_PREFIX

      static final java.lang.String UNIDENTIFIED_PLAYER_PREFIX
      Messages from non-identified players have the player set as this string followed by a unique number
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

  • Method Details

    • send

      void send​(OutboundMessage message)
      Send a message to a player The message will reach the player in an unspecified amount of time If there's an error while sending the message, the error handlers will be notified
      Parameters:
      message - The message

    • registerHandler

      void registerHandler​(IConnectHandler receiver)
      Register a connect handler
      Parameters:
      receiver - The IConnectHandler

    • registerHandler

      void registerHandler​(IMessageHandler receiver)
      Register a message handler
      Parameters:
      receiver - The IMessageHandler

    • registerHandler

      void registerHandler​(IErrorHandler receiver)
      Register a error handler
      Parameters:
      receiver - The IErrorHandler

    • identify

      void identify​(java.lang.String tempName, java.lang.String player)
      Identify a temporary fake name with the actual player name
      Parameters:
      tempName - The temporary name
      player - The player name

    • disconnect

      void disconnect​(java.lang.String player)
      Disconnect a player
      Parameters:
      player - The player's name or the fake temporary name

    • shutdown

      void shutdown()
      Shut down the server, disconnecting every player

    • isIdentified

      static boolean isIdentified​(java.lang.String player)
      Checks if the player is identified
      Parameters:
      player - The player, or the fake temporary name
      Returns:
      true if the player does not have a temporary name
